trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Statesboro
There were no other sightings in Statesboro on or around November 28th 2006
Summary: A row of amber light,one appearing & burning out as the next one appeared totalling 4
divs: Sighting DetailsA row of amber lights, one appearing and burning out as the next one appeared, totalling four.Three of us saw this occur twice, in the same area, but in a different. Down the road( we were driving) it happened again, but only two and three lights. They were not flares or fireworks- in a straight line, appearing and burning out. I am a news reporter and posted a blog on our web site (www.statesboroherald.net) and people replied, stating they saw this as well. A woman from Screven County called after seeing this blog and told me a very interesting encounter her and her son had with the same kind of lights, but forming in lines and a v-shaped, and appearing to form a light show.
